comment: True story : We have never argued . Not once . I mean that . We ve had intense conversations , but never exchanged a single salty or sarcastic word . But he likes to pick up my keys and make sure my car is locked . Just hit the button . Make it go beep . And that infuriates me . <URL>

comment: She may not be bothered , because it s not inherently bothersome . But I can t not internalize it as him checking on me . Going behind me to redo something I ve done or ensure I did it at all . It honestly reads as criticism to me , when it absolutely isn t , and it s my hangup .
